snippet: Amid acrimony, Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu’s coalition appears to be on the brink of collapse.
abstract: Israel moves closer to early elections, as Prime Min Benjamin Netanyahu's coalition appears to be on edge of collapse; brewing political crisis between his conservative Likud Party and centrist Yesh Atid was triggered by diplomatic and economic issues and proposed nationality law.
lead_paragraph: Amid acrimony, Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu’s coalition appears to be on the brink of collapse.
